name: Celery Root, With Mushrooms and Parmesan
keywords: celery root, mushroom, parmesan, fall, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces Parmesan cheese in small pieces
Juice of 1 small lemon (or to taste)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and cut the celery into matchstick-size pieces and blanch them in boiling water. Remove and drain.

Wash the mushrooms, dry them thoroughly and slice them thinly. Combine in a salad bowl with the celery root and Parmesan cheese. In a separate bowl, mix the lemon, olive oil, parsley, salt and pepper. Pour the mixture over the vegetables and toss thoroughly.
